title: Nutrition-Recipe-Finder
Description: Nutrition Recipe Finder helps you discover tasty recipes that suit your lifestyle. Whether you're looking for plant-based dishes, gluten-free options, or just something fresh and nourishing, this tool makes it easy to explore meals that fit your preferences. Simple to use and full of inspiration, it's your companion for healthier everyday cooking

title: Explore-Mittweida
Description: The Frontend for a Full-stack mobile web app for day-trippers visiting Mittweida, built with React JS . Created after Directly meeting the mayor, who shared his goal of boosting tourism. The app helps visitors explore the town with ease and discover local highlights

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
Description: Tic-Tac-Toe, Tired of drawing X’s and O’s all over your notebook? Now you can play the classic Tic-Tac-Toe game right on your device! Challenge a friend on the same screen, take turns, and enjoy neat, hassle-free gameplay without any mess. — just simple, fun, and better than scribbling in your copybook.
